name: Hantek6022
Info:
Hantek6022API from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rpcope1/Hantek6022API/master
cd Hantek6022API/PyHT6022/HantekFirmware/fx2lib
make
make docs
cd fw
make

cd ..
cd ..
cd ..

sudo cp 60-hantek-6022-usb.rules /lib/udev/rules.d/

sudo apt install sdcc
cd PyHT6022/HantekFirmware/custom
make

cd ..
cd ..
cd ..
python3 setup.py install
